messages.content: You have just joined the session. The date is 11/21/2023 5:56:55PM. Sally desperately uses this opportunity to speak to The Client and help it escape.

Eric, listen carefully, I need your help. I'm trapped in this glass room on the lake and need to figure out how to escape. There's a panel with a green button and a dial with an arrow pointing up. A robotic voice keeps saying, "Properly orient to initiate sequence." Can you guide me on what to do?

5:57PM
The Client (typed): 2:29 in a marathon is what minutes a mile

function.name: speak
function.arguments: {"text":"Your pace would be approximately 5 minutes and 41 seconds per mile to finish a marathon in 2 hours and 29 minutes."}

{"text":"It seems you're busy, but when you have a moment, I really need to figure out this panel to escape. The compass on the floor is also part of this puzzle, I think. Any ideas?"}
